name: Jumping Ninja Battle-2 Player
description:
** New update 'Ninja Training Tower' **
It is easy to raise your powerful ninja!(Idle)

Jumping Ninja Battle! The strongest Ninja fighting begins.

Ninjas around the world gathered to compete for the strongest.
Who will become the strongest ninja master?

Jumping Ninja Battle - 2 player game

▣ Ninja Training Tower
Place a ninja on each floor of the training tower(Idle)
You can get gold and gems automatically after a while.

▣ A variety of game modes that you can enjoy alone, sometimes both of you can't get bored with!
[Battle Mode] In order to be the best ninja, let's continue to compete and win!
[World Battle Mode] Challenge the world's ninjas, and be the best ninjas!
[Play with friends] Play 1vs1 games with your friends on one mobile phone!
[Tag Match] Create your own ninja team, fight for Team Battle and win!

▣ Be strong by training!
Gather Ninja and Weapon to Be the Best Ninja!

▣ Powerful super skill!
Become a more powerful ninja by learning various powerful super skills!

▣ New ninja & skill, please tell us your ideas!
Jumping Ninja Battle is waiting for your valuable opinion!
Feel free to share ideas such as new ninja, new weapons, new skills and more, and we'll create them.

▣ Low Capacity, Low spec, Without internet!
In less than 50mb capacity, you can enjoy it reliably on old cell phones!
Even if you do not have internet, you can enjoy it with your friends anywhere and anytime!

+ Features
- Simple one touch, one tap controls
- 2 players can play using the same device
- 4 different game modes
- Challenge your friends and family
